title: Recruitment Drive
description: Drone War Fallout. Online Eyes. A Clandestine Crusade. Joshua is a street urchin drifting through the desolate, drone-patrolled alleys of Chicago, searching for his mysteriously abducted sister. Until one day he makes an incredible discovery that places him in the middle of an epic power struggle, along with a means to uncover the truth. The action-packed first act of The Covert Academy...
author: Peter Laurent
